Title: User sign up
Summary: As a provider, I want to sign up with my email and password so that I can create an account.

Title: Password reset
Summary: As a provider, I want to reset my password via email so that I can regain access to my account if I forget my password.

Title: Email verification
Summary: As a provider, I want to verify my email address after signing up so that the system knows my email is valid.

Title: Profile completion
Summary: As a provider, I want to complete my professional profile including credentials, specialties, and locations so that patients can find accurate information about me.

Title: User management dashboard
Summary: As an admin, I want to view and manage all provider accounts so that I can help users with account issues and moderate the platform.
